entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 11:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -13.2°C
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
